question: Which Indian state recently signed an MoU with Government e-Marketplace (GeM) to set up a GeM Organizational Transformation Team (GOTT) unit?
explanation:
The state government of Uttar Pradesh recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Government e-Marketplace (GeM) under the Ministry of Commerce & Industry. The agreement is aimed to set up a GeM Organizational Transformation Team (GOTT) Project Management Unit (PMU) in Uttar Pradesh.
The MSME units of the state can transact on GeM in a more efficient and easy manner under the Project Management Unit (PMU). GOTT assists the buyer agency in redesigning the procurement processes and enhance competencies. Uttar Pradesh is the second state after Punjab to set up a GOTT-PMU to effectively use the GeM initiative.
